headline: Bernstein Maintains a Hold Rating on Analog Devices Inc. (ADI).
summary: Analog Devices Inc. (NASDAQ:ADI) is one of the 8 Biggest EV Stocks to Watch in 2025. According to a published report, Bernstein analyst Stacy Rasgon kept Analog Devices Inc. (NASDAQ:ADI) at a Hold rating, with a $220.00 price target. Yesterday, the closing price of the company’s shares was $227.66. The second-quarter fiscal revenue of Analog […]
